summary: This module contains unit tests that verify the functionality of Kedro's session hook manager, ensuring that hooks are properly registered, duplicate registrations are prevented, automatic discovery can be disabled via settings, and that hooks are initialized when a Kedro session is created. Helper utilities are provided to simulate plugin modules and mock project settings.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the extensibility mechanism of Kedro sessions by testing hook registration and lifecycle behavior, thereby ensuring reliable plugin integration and configurable hook discovery.
